name: muzzily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that suggests you are confused and unable to think clearly: He squinted muzzily through the cigarette smoke. His green eyes blinked muzzily. See
muzzy
More examplesFewer examplesShe shook her head muzzily, trying to get some feeling back into it."I'll phone him tomorrow, first thing," she thought muzzily. He peered at me and smiled muzzily.
